name: KAHI Wrinkle Bounce Multi Balm Facial Moisturizer | All-in-One Hydrating Lip Balm Eye Cream Neck Cream Make Up Base & Face Mist Moisture Balm Stick | Daily Face Moisturizer Stick (0.32 fl oz)
about_this_item: ‚úÖ ALL-IN-ONE BEAUTY BALM ESSENTIAL. Indulge in the luxury of an all-in-one multi-balm that combines the benefits of moisturizing lip balm, eye cream, neck cream, makeup base, and face mist! This simplifies your beauty ritual while saving you time and effort in your daily skin care.

‚úÖ ELASTICITY & RADIANCE REVIVAL. Infused with Salmon Complex and Collagen which improves your skin by reducing fine lines and giving you a radiant complexion. KAHI multi balm stick Korean enhances skin elasticity in the cheeks and upper eyelids and supports recovery from pressure marks.

‚úÖ UNWAVERING 48HR HYDRATION GLOW BALM. This skin balm offers a strong lifting effect and moisture shield for the forehead, between the eyebrows, around the eyes, nasolabial folds, neck, and lips. It provides long-lasting hydration for up to 48 hours which gives you a fresh and vibrant look all day.

‚úÖ JEJU'S FACE CARE NOURISHING SECRET. Enriched with Jeju's natural fermented oil, this face balm stick deeply penetrates your skin while refining and purifying your pores and diminishing the appearance of fine lines. It leads to a youthful appearance with increased skin brightness and reduced yellowness.

‚úÖ ON-THE-GO SOOTHING BALM. Take this face and body balm stick with you wherever you go to ensure that your radiant glow is never out of reach! Its convenient size and packaging make it an ideal companion for your on-the-go lifestyle to indulge in its transformative effects anytime and anywhere.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I wanted to come back several months later to add more to my review. The product is a good value for the money as it lasts quite a long time. I still have my original purchase. As I said before, I add it like a highlighter to add a bit of shine at the top of my cheekbones and collarbone. It is glossy and wet looking at first, but once the skin absorbs it in there is an effect of a glow from within. I've found when younger (gen x) we were pushed to make our oily teen skin look matte to appear more mature, but now that we are this recreates that youthful luminosity to the skin precisely where it is applied. I've also put this under my eyes and noticed a reduction in puffiness, but definitely apply it a bit before you need it to give it time to absorb.  I get compliments on my skin almost every time I wear it.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2024
